Title: D.C. I&II P.S.P. Re-Animated
Description: ['An OVA bundled with a PSP game Da Capo: D.C. I & II P.S.P. It features animated confession scenes for the four main heroines of the two games, Nemu, Kotori, Yume, and Otome. ']
Related: ['Other: Monster Strike the Movie: Sora no Kanata', 'Prequel: Monster Strike The Animation Episode 0']
